data.name: Fujii
data.detailed_description:
Supports Valve Index (and Index Controllers)


Fujii fully supports the Valve Index HMD and the Valve Index Controllers.


About the Game



Fujii is a magical journey through dreamlike landscapes waiting to be explored. With a serene soundtrack enveloping your surroundings, you will plant, water, and grow a lush garden full of color and wonder.

üåø FEATURES üåø

  • Hiking across three organic biomes and discovering their enchanted flowers and plants
  • Collecting seeds to grow colorful landscapes and cultivating your own unique garden
  • A Relaxing meditative soundtrack that enhances the peaceful and whimsical VR experience by French artist and composer, Norman Bambi
  • Introducing critters and insect life into your garden with the help of your adorable gnome friend



Created by Funktronic Labs, the makers of the award-winning games Wave Break, and VR titles Cosmic Trip and Starbear: Taxi. Technology support by RareFaction Interactive.

data.short_description: Explore and grow a colorful, whimsical garden in this peaceful, VR adventure. The power to make plants blossom and thrive is literally at your fingertips. Collect critter eggs and seeds to cultivate and bring the garden of your dreams to life.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 4GB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
